Name:
McLean Clan
USS Irene Forsyte
Port of registry: Lunenburg, Nova Scotia, 1920–1929; Windsor, Nova Scotia 1929-c. 1932
Fate:
Sold to American owners in 1930s

Sold, 18 October 1945
Sunk 21 December 1951
Armament:
1 × 4 in (100 mm) gun
1 × 40 mm gun
2 × 20 mm guns
1 × Mousetrap anti-submarine rocket
